# f5distributedcloud_certificate (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_certificate` data source retrieves information about an existing certificate.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_certificate" "example" {
  name      = "my-certificate"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "cert_type" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_certificate.example.cert_type
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the certificate to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the certificate is located.

### Read-Only

- `cert_type` (String) Type of certificate (TLS, MTLS).
- `description` (String) Description of the certificate.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the certificate.
